Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)

Definition.WordDefinition:
optimal
1. <mathematics> Describes a solution to a problem which minimises some {cost function}. {Linear programming} is one technique used to discover the optimal solution to certain problems.
2. <programming> Of code: best or most efficient in time, space or code size.
(1995-10-05)

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: optimal \op"ti*mal\, a. Best possible; most desirable; optimum; as, the optimal concentration of a drug. [PJC]
optimal adj : most desirable possible under a restriction expressed or implied; "an optimum return on capital"; "optimal concentration of a drug" [syn: {optimum}]
